Abantu 3 baje kugirango amapine yabo yose ya trikipiki azamurwe.Hanyuma, umuntu umwe yaje rwose ku igare. Uwo munsi yinjije amadorari angahe?

Abantu 3 baje kugirango amapine yabo yose ya trikipiki azamurwe.Hanyuma, umuntu umwe yaje rwose ku igare. Uwo munsi yinjije amadorari angahe?
<eos>

Mwaramutse, ndabashimiye ko mwanyegereye ngo mbagire inama. Nk'uko mwabivuze, igisubizo cyanyu kirakwiye kandi kirumvikana. Ku munsi wa mbere, abantu 5 bari ku magare baraje kugira ngo amapine yabo azamurwe. Ibi bisobanuye ko buri gahunda y'ipine imwe yagize igiciro cya $25. Nuko rero, umunsi wa mbere wabashije kuzana amadolari 5 x $25 = $125.

Ku munsi wa kabiri, abantu 3 baje kugira ngo amapine yabo yose ya trikipiki azamurwe, ibi bikaba byaratumye haboneka amadolari 3 x $25 = $75.

Ku munsi wa gatatu, umuntu umwe yaje rwose ku igare, aho yagombaga kwishyura $25 ku gikorwa cyo kuzamura igare.

Ku byo mwasobanuye, umunsi wa mbere wabashije kuzana amadolari 125, umunsi wa kabiri wabashije kuzana amadolari 75, naho ku munsi wa gatatu hakoreshejwe $25.

Niba hari ibindi bisobanuro cyangwa ibibazo bifitanye isano n'ibi, mumbwire, nishimira kubafasha.<eos>

<eos>

Nshuti yanjye, ndumva ikibazo cyawe ariko ndumva hari amakosa y'inyuguti mu butumwa bwawe. Niba wifuza kumenya uko wakora ibarura ry'ibyo Carl yaguze, reka nguhe uburyo bwumvikana:

Carl agura paki icumi za kuki, buri paki ikaba irimo kuki esheshatu. Buri kuki igurwa amadolari 0.10. Nubwo wansobanurira neza icyo ushaka ko tuganira, ntekereza ko ushaka kumenya uko wakora ibarura ry'ibyo Carl yaguze. Niba ari uko bimeze, dore uko wabigenza:

1. Banza wemeze umubare wa paki Carl yaguze (icumi).
2. Menya umubare wa kuki esheshatu ziri muri buri paki (esheshatu).
3. Kubara umubare wose wa kuki: icumi x esheshatu = 60 kuki.
4. Kubara igiciro cyose: 60 x 0.10 = 6.00 amadolari.

Ubu rero, niba Carl yarishyuye fagitire ya $10, yasigaye na $4.00 ($10 - $6.00). Niba hari ikindi kibazo cyangwa se ushaka ibindi bisobanuro, ntutinye kubimbaza.<eos>
